title: Shaken or Stirred
desc: Express app for creating a list of cocktails you want to try and ones you've already tried.

title: Note Taker
desc: A note taking application built with Express and Node.

title: How's It Growing?
desc: Express app for keeping a watering schedule for the plants in your house.

title: How's the Weather?
desc: Weather searching app that uses an API search to find current and future forecasts of searched cities.

title: Work Day Planner
desc: Simple planner application using moment.js to dynamically add features based off the time of day.

title: J's Cookbook
desc: Application for finding recipes based off ingredients you already have in your house.
